description: SPUS is an ETF offering value-conscious, Sharia-compliant exposure to 200 low-leverage stocks from the S&P 500 Index. It is designed to provide investors with value-focused exposure to a diversified portfolio of Sharia-compliant stocks, adhering to the guidelines set by the Accounting and Auditing Organization for Islamic Financial Institutions (AAOIFI).
name: SP Funds S&P 500 Sharia Industry Exclusions ETF
